answers.answer: Hai mine ws done yesterday I m 140 but they want me to do the 3 hr test... Has anyone turned out to be normal for the 3 hr test

I think since I already passed this one.. I will be fine on the 3 hour one... I just think it's more unhealthy to drink that sugar again and fast for so long.  I reaaaaalllly don't want to do it again

Its always hard to say. With my first it was normal. but this being mt second it was high. After controlling my diet for a month its still high. Im now on insulin. freaked me out at first but now I've learnt how to deal with it. I dont feel like its the end of the world but cant wait to not have to poke my slef all the time.

I have Gestational diabetes and for the 1 hour test anything below 130 is normal I believe is what my doctor told me. You can still pass the 3 hour one my friend had that happen and since your first results werent too high I hope you will.
My first test was high and I had to take the 3hr. I passed that one..the advice I would give to pass is not eat after midnight as suggested or the morning before the test and you should be fine.

question: So anything under 140 is passing for the one hour glucola test... And my midwife wants me to do the 3 hour because diabetes runs in my family.  Has anyone had this happen to them?
title: Glucose results 134.... But they want me to do it again
